required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study in Healthy Subjects and Mild Asthmatics to Investigate Pharmacokinetics of AZD5423 When Administered in Different Ways
clinical_study.official_title: An Open, Partly Randomised, Four-way Cross-over Study in Healthy Subjects and in Patients With Mild Allergic Asthma to Investigate the Bioavailability and Basic Pharmacokinetics of a Single Dose of AZD5423 When Administered Intravenously, Orally, Inhaled Via SPIRA Nebuliser or Inhaled Via I-neb® AAD Systems

brief_summary.textblock: A study in healthy subjects and mild asthmatics to investigate Pharmacokinetics of AZD5423 when administered in different ways.

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of AZD5423 measured by: Absolute bioavailability (F)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pharmacokinetic (PK) sampling will be performed day 1 to day 5 for each treatment period

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of AZD5423 measured by: Pulmonary bioavailability (Fpulmonary)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pharmacokinetic (PK) sampling will be performed day 1 to day 5 for each treatment period

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of AZD5423 measured by: Oral bioavailability after inhaled treatments (Foral)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pharmacokinetic (PK) sampling will be performed day 1 to day 5 for each treatment period

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics of AZD5423 measured by: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time zero to infinity (AUC).
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pharmacokinetic (PK) sampling will be performed day 1 to day 5 for each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: To compare the pharmacokinetics between healthy subjects and asthma patients and estimate the basic pharmacokinetic parameters of AZD5423 by measuring e.g. maximum plasma concentration, Cmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pharmacokinetic (PK) sampling will be performed day 1 to day 5 for each treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of AZD5423 measured by adverse events, laboratory variables, physical examination, electrocardiograms, blood pressure and pulse, and spirometry.
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of AZD5423 measured by (Adverse events) (Laboratory variables) (Physical examination) (Electrocardiograms) (blood pressure and pulse) (Spirometry)

intervention.description: solution for injection, administered as intravenous infusion Corr to total dose of 250µg AZD5423
nebuliser suspension, inhaled via Spira, corr to approximately 300 µg lung deposited dose AZD5423
nebuliser suspension, inhaled via I-neb, corr to approximately 300 µg lung deposited dose AZD5423
nebuliser suspension to be administered orally, corr to a total dose of 1200 µg AZD5423

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male healthy subjects and male asthma patients aged 18 to 45 years (inclusive)
- Have a body mass index (BMI) between 18 and 30 kg/m2 (inclusive and rounding allowed) and weight between 50 and 100 kg (inclusive)
- Be able to inhale from the SPIRA nebuliser and I-neb® according to the provided instructions
- Asthma patients should fulfil the following criteria: Pre-bronchodilator forced expiratory volume at 1 second (FEV1) ≥70% of predicted normal value
- Asthma diagnosis according to GINA guidelines with a history of episodic wheeze and shortness of breath
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of any clinically significant disease or disorder
- Any clinically relevant abnormal findings
- Current smokers
- Asthma patients: Worsening of asthma or respiratory infection within 6 weeks before screening
- Asthma patients: Use of inhaled, nasal, oral, rectal or parenteral corticosteroids within 30 days before first administration of investigational product and during the study

overall_official.affiliation: Quintiles Drug Research Unit at Guy's Hospital

clinical_study.keyword: Level of AZD5423 in your blood
